content: loose and airy this modern crochet tank is the perfect summer top the sea breeze tank top is an easy crochet pattern that is created in identical panels that are seamed together down the sides and straps sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl skill level easy this pattern is also accompanied by a video tutorial check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
